TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content:
> 
>

> 
> 
> We have made no changes on our end. Is it possible that X's format changed in some way?
> 

Can anyone else post X links from a computer?

[https://x.com/NASASpaceflight/status/1792193887945052424](https://x.com/NASASpaceflight/status/1792193887945052424)

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedid="embed4462887797" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=https://twitter.com/NASASpaceflight/status/1792193887945052424" style="height:702px;"></iframe>

There's the problem. The top link is x.com (unembedded) I altered the URL to twitter and it works. The forum doesn't know what x is.
Is it possble to pass ownership of a thread to someone?

Any idea why the forum keeps giving a 502 bad gateway error today? Ive been hit by it 5-6 times. On iphone current ios. Xr model iphone…

160306142024
We had the same problem. No idea what caused it , sorry.
There have been intermittent outages for the last few days, though most were quite short.
I have made 23 posts that were approved and somehow the 5 approved posts block is still showing up for me. What is going on?

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, tryharder said:
> 
> 
> I have made 23 posts that were approved and somehow the 5 approved posts block is still showing up for me. What is going on?
> 

Posts in the Games sub don't count for the anti-spambot measures. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Then do posts here count?

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, tryharder said:
> 
> 
> Then do posts here count?
> 

Yes, all posts outside of the games sub forum count. [Welcome aboard](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/24-welcome-aboard/) is a great place to introduce yourself! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
Okay, thanks for the information!
what is reputation?

> 
> 
> 24 minutes ago, KerbolRacer21 said:
> 
> 
> what is reputation?
> 

It's the number of times someone has clicked the Like button on one of your posts.  

I believe the forum software can make it more complicated than that, but that's what we have it set to.
And different forums call it different things. We still call it reputation out of habit even though the software changed the button to "like" a while back.
Joan Jett never cared about reputation. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
>

>

> Joan Jett never cared about reputation. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

Thanks. Now I have to go to the songs stuck in your head thread.

do any of the mods miss the time and seeming stability of the vbulletin days? I kinda do myself as I honestly <the great="" purge="" not="" withstanding=""> do not recall seeing nearly as many connection issues with the forums back in those days with like the 502 bad gateway issues or the odd blue box ? forum avatars that I see now more often than not. Is it just me that misses those days?

204507012024

There have been some interruptions lately but over all I don't believe this software is better or worse than the previous ones. It looks like somebody got the recent troubles sorted, too, because I haven't noticed any trouble for several days.
